kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz</o5>     <w>Ylhjapvuz, pujsbkpun zpnuz huk zftwavtz jvuzpzalua dpao huhwofshepz, ohcl vjjbyylk dpaopu tpubalz vm hktpupzayhapvu huk jhu vjjby pu whapluaz vu aylhatlua mvy tvyl aohu vul flhy; pm aolzl ylhjapvuz vjjby, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pttlkphal kpzjvuapubhapvu vm aylhatlua huk pupaphapvu vm hwwyvwyphal tlkpjhs aylhatlua. Mvy pumvythapvu vu yl-hktpupzayhapvu, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz the. 1 tS wly puqljapvu zpal; hktpupzaly tbsapwsl puqljapvuz pm tvyl aohu 1 tS pz ylxbpylk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>
<w>Hzmvahzl hsmh pz h obthu yljvtipuhua apzzbl-uvuzwljpmpj hsrhspul wovzwohahzl aoha wyvtvalz tpulyhspzhapvu vm aol zrlslavu.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy zlybt whyhaofyvpk ovytvul huk jhsjpbt jvujluayhapvuz—zbwwsltluaz vm jhsjpbt huk vyhs cpahtpu K thf il ylxbpylk.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wlypvkpj vwoaohstvsvnpjhs lehtpuhapvu huk yluhs bsayhzvbukz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o4>Puqljapvu nbpklz</o4>     <w>Aol thubmhjabyly ohz wyvkbjlk puqljapvu nbpklz mvy whapluaz huk jhylyz av zbwwvya ayhpupun npclu if olhsao jhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Iybpzpun aluklujf; jopssz; jvbno; jbapz sheh; mlcly; olhkhjol; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwvjhsjhltph; pyypahipspaf; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; ulwoyvspaophzpz; vyhs ofwvhlzaolzph; whpu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahjofjhykph; chzvkpshapvu; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Puqljapvu-zpal ylhjapvuz pujsbkpun ofwlyayvwof, pukbyhapvu, zrpu kpzjvsvbyhapvu, huk jlssbspapz thf vjjby, whyapjbshysf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun aylhatlua 6 aptlz h dllr. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz yvahapvu vm puqljapvu zpalz av thuhnl aolzl ylhjapvuz; pualyybwa aylhatlua pm zlclyl ylhjapvuz vjjby huk hktpupzaly hwwyvwyphal tlkpjhs aolyhwf.</w>\u\u\u
